subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Football
Football (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Judge John Cleland delayed the start of the former Penn State assistant Jerry Sandusky’s trial on child sexual abuse charges by three weeks to early June because of “logistical contingencies.”
snippet: Judge John Cleland delayed the start of the former Penn State assistant Jerry Sandusky’s trial on child sexual abuse charges by three weeks to early June because of “logistical contingencies.”
